00034 ClientBufferedReaderHandler::ClientBufferedReaderHandler(
00035     DfsBroker::Client *client, uint32_t fd, uint32_t buf_size,
00036     uint32_t outstanding, uint64_t start_offset, uint64_t end_offset) :
00037     m_client(client), m_fd(fd), m_read_size(buf_size), m_eof(false),
00038     m_error(Error::OK) {
00039 
00040   m_max_outstanding = outstanding;
00041   m_end_offset = end_offset;
00042   m_outstanding_offset = start_offset;
00043   m_actual_offset = start_offset;
00044 
00048   if (start_offset > 0) {
00049     try { m_client->seek(m_fd, start_offset); }
00050     catch (...) {
00051       m_eof = true;
00052       throw;
00053     }
00054   }
00055 
00056   {
00057     boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(m_mutex);
00058     uint32_t toread;
00059 
00060     for (m_outstanding=0; m_outstanding<m_max_outstanding; m_outstanding++) {
00061       if (m_end_offset && (m_end_offset-m_outstanding_offset) < m_read_size) {
00062         if ((toread = (uint32_t)(m_end_offset - m_outstanding_offset)) == 0)
00063           break;
00064       }
00065       else
00066         toread = m_read_size;
00067 
00068       try { m_client->read(m_fd, toread, this); }
00069       catch (...) {
00070         m_eof = true;
00071         throw;
00072       }
00073       m_outstanding_offset -= toread;
00074     }
00075     m_ptr = m_end_ptr = 0;
00076   }
00077 }

00081 ClientBufferedReaderHandler::~ClientBufferedReaderHandler() {
00082   try {
00083     boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(m_mutex);
00084     m_eof = true;
00085 
00086     while (m_outstanding > 0)
00087       m_cond.wait(lock);
00088   }
00089   catch (...) {
00090     HT_ERROR("synchronization error");
00091   }
00092 }

00099 void ClientBufferedReaderHandler::handle(EventPtr &eventPtr) {
00100   boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(m_mutex);
00101 
00102   m_outstanding--;
00103 
00104   if (eventPtr->type == Event::MESSAGE) {
00105     if ((m_error = (int)Protocol::response_code(eventPtr)) != Error::OK) {
00106       HT_ERRORF("DFS read error (amount=%u, fd=%d) : %s",
00107                 m_read_size, m_fd,
00108                 Protocol::string_format_message(eventPtr).c_str());
00109       m_eof = true;
00110       return;
00111     }
00112     m_queue.push(eventPtr);
00113 
00114     uint64_t offset;
00115     size_t amount = Filesystem::decode_response_read_header(eventPtr, &offset);
00116     m_actual_offset += amount;
00117 
00118     if (amount < m_read_size) {
00119       m_eof = true;
00120     }
00121   }
00122   else if (eventPtr->type == Event::ERROR) {
00123     HT_ERRORF("%s", eventPtr->toString().c_str());    
00124     m_error = eventPtr->error;
00125     m_eof = true;
00126   }
00127   else {
00128     HT_ERRORF("%s", eventPtr->toString().c_str());
00129     m_error = Error::FAILED_EXPECTATION;
00130   }
00131 
00132   m_cond.notify_all();
00133 }

00140 size_t
00141 ClientBufferedReaderHandler::read(void *buf, size_t len) {
00142   boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(m_mutex);
00143   uint8_t *ptr = (uint8_t *)buf;
00144   long nleft = len;
00145   long available, nread;
00146 
00147   while (true) {
00148 
00149     while (m_queue.empty() && !m_eof)
00150       m_cond.wait(lock);
00151 
00152     if (m_error != Error::OK)
00153       throw Exception(m_error);
00154       
00155     if (m_queue.empty())
00156       throw Exception(Error::FAILED_EXPECTATION, "empty queue");
00157 
00158     if (m_ptr == 0) {
00159       uint64_t offset;
00160       uint32_t amount;
00161       EventPtr &eventPtr = m_queue.front();
00162       amount = Filesystem::decode_response_read_header(eventPtr, &offset,
00163                                                        &m_ptr);
00164       m_end_ptr = m_ptr + amount;
00165     }
00166 
00167     available = m_end_ptr - m_ptr;
00168 
00169     if (available >= nleft) {
00170       memcpy(ptr, m_ptr, nleft);
00171       nread = len;
00172       m_ptr += nleft;
00173       if ((m_end_ptr - m_ptr) == 0) {
00174         m_queue.pop();
00175         m_ptr = 0;
00176         read_ahead();
00177       }
00178       break;
00179     }
00180     else if (available == 0) {
00181       if (m_eof && m_queue.size() == 1) {
00182         m_queue.pop();
00183         m_ptr = m_end_ptr = 0;
00184         nread = len - nleft;
00185         break;
00186       }
00187     }
00188 
00189     memcpy(ptr, m_ptr, available);
00190     ptr += available;
00191     nleft -= available;
00192     m_queue.pop();
00193     m_ptr = 0;
00194     read_ahead();
00195   }
00196 
00197   return nread;
00198 }

00201 
00205 void ClientBufferedReaderHandler::read_ahead() {
00206   uint32_t n = m_max_outstanding - (m_outstanding + m_queue.size());
00207   uint32_t toread;
00208 
00209   assert(m_max_outstanding >= (m_outstanding + m_queue.size()));
00210   
00211   if (m_eof)
00212     return;
00213 
00214   for (uint32_t i=0; i<n; i++) {
00215     if (m_end_offset && (m_end_offset-m_outstanding_offset) < m_read_size) {
00216       if ((toread = (uint32_t)(m_end_offset - m_outstanding_offset)) == 0)
00217         break;
00218     }
00219     else
00220       toread = m_read_size;
00221 
00222     try { m_client->read(m_fd, toread, this); }
00223     catch(...) {
00224       m_eof = true;
00225       throw;
00226     }
00227     m_outstanding++;
00228     m_outstanding_offset -= toread;
00229   }
00230 }
